projects.title: My Projects
projects.weatherDescription: A dynamic weather forecast application built with React, Vite, and Redux Toolkit. This fully responsive app automatically detects user location via browser geolocation (with an IP-based fallback) or allows users to search for any city. It integrates OpenWeatherMap and Geoapify APIs to provide current conditions, hourly, and 7-day forecasts. Key features include robust asynchronous state management with Redux Thunk, a client-side localStorage cache to optimize API calls, and a persistent dark/light mode theme toggle.
projects.storeDescription: A modern, responsive e-commerce storefront built with React 19, Vite, and Redux Toolkit. This application features a dynamic product catalog, real-time search, advanced sorting, and a functional shopping cart, all powered by the dummyjson.com API. The project showcases a clean architecture using custom hooks for logic, React Router for navigation, and a design-token-based styling system with SASS/SCSS Modules.

geo.title: Automatic Geolocation
geo.description: The application automatically detects the user's location and loads an accurate weather forecast in real time.

adaptive.title: Adaptivity and Theming
adaptive.description: The interface is fully adapted for mobile and desktop devices. Theme switching support (light/dark) is implemented.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: The project is built on a modern React and Redux stack. This ensures instant interface response without page reloads and stable application performance even with a weak internet connection.

api.title: Server-Side Pagination and Sorting
api.description: Implemented interaction with DummyJSON API: pagination, sorting, and search are performed server-side through request parameters (limit, skip, sortBy).

url.title: URL Synchronization
url.description: The catalog state is tightly coupled with the browser's address bar. When changing pagination pages, the URL parameter updates. This allows users to share links to specific product pages or bookmark them without losing context.

architecture.title: Isolated Business Logic
architecture.description: UI components are only responsible for rendering, while all logic is extracted into custom hooks (useProductCatalog, useProduct) and asynchronous Redux Thunk functions. This makes the code clean, predictable, and easy to test.
